name: Breaking Bad
description: A high school chemistry teacher turned meth maker partners with a former student to secure his family's future.

name: El Camino
description: In the wake of his dramatic escape from captivity, Jesse must come to terms with his past in order to forge some kind of future.

name: Better Call Saul
description: De serie volgt Jimmy McGill als advocaat en zijn verhaal voor hij Saul Goodman wordt. De serie speelt zich af in 2002, zes jaar voor de gebeurtenissen van Breaking

episodes.title: Duo
episodes.description: Jimmy works his magic in the courtroom. Unexpected inspiration leads him to an unconventional pursuit of potential clients.

episodes.title: Mijo
episodes.description: Jimmy seizes an opportunity to reconnect with an old friend. Chuck adjusts to a new way of life.

episodes.title: Nacho
episodes.description: Jimmy pulls out all the stops to prove that his dangerous client is innocent, even though it causes some friction with Kim.

episodes.title: Hero
episodes.description: Jimmy conjures up a bold plan to solicit new clients, but has to face the consequences when the scheme strains his relationship with a rival firm.

episodes.title: Alpine Shepherd Boy
episodes.description: When his efforts to drum up new business are interrupted by alarming news, Jimmy is pressured to make a difficult choice.

episodes.title: Five-O
episodes.description: Mike's tragic past comes back to haunt him, and he's forced to seek help from an unusual source. Meanwhile, Jimmy's moral compass is put to the test.

episodes.title: Bingo
episodes.description: Jimmy meets with potential new clients. Then, when given the opportunity to do the right thing, he cashes in a favor from an unlikely ally.

episodes.title: Rico
episodes.description: Jimmy shows Chuck that he's willing to do almost anything to win a case, even if it means getting his hands dirty.

episodes.title: Pimento
episodes.description: Chuck wants to transfer the Sandpiper case to HHM, but Jimmy's decision to take the case to a law firm known for fraud cases leaves Chuck appalled.

episodes.title: Marco
episodes.description: Jimmy seizes the opportunity to reconnect with an old friend. Chuck adjusts to a new way of life.

episodes.title: Switch
episodes.description: Jimmy and Kim's relationship takes a new turn. Mike decides it's for the best to sever his affiliation with an unrestrained associate.

episodes.title: Cobbler
episodes.description: Jimmy's actions unexpectedly create waves for Kim. Mike cautiously weighs a lucrative proposal that might bring about dire consequences.

episodes.title: Amarillo
episodes.description: Jimmy's client outreach efforts thrive, and he exhibits new heights of showmanship. Mike is perplexed by daughter-in-law Stacey's troubling news.

episodes.title: Gloves Off
episodes.description: Jimmy's actions unexpectedly create waves for Kim. Mike cautiously weighs a lucrative proposal that might bring about dire consequences.

episodes.title: Rebecca
episodes.description: Jimmy becomes frustrated with his restrictive work environment. Kim pulls out all the stops to dig herself out of a seemingly bottomless hole at HHM.

episodes.title: Bali Ha'i
episodes.description: Jimmy finds comfort in a familiar place. Kim receives a life-changing proposal. Mike is pushed to the limit when what he holds dearest is threatened.

episodes.description: Mike's growing frustration shows when his hand is forced, but with Jimmy's help, he works to keep the peace. Meanwhile, Jimmy boldly forges a new path forward.

name: Cyberpunk Edgerunners
description: A Street Kid trying to survive in a technology and body modification-obsessed city of the future. Having everything to lose, he chooses to stay alive by becoming an Edgerunner, a Mercenary outlaw also known as a Cyberpunk.

name: Invincible
description: Mark Grayson is a normal teenager, except for the fact that his father is the most powerful superhero on the planet. Shortly after his seventeenth birthday, Mark begins to develop powers of his own and enters into his father's tutelage.
